headline.main: OWI WARNS PUBLIC OF RUMOR CARRIERS; Dissection of 4,500 Bits of Gossip Reveals Peril to Nation's War Effort  HATE' THE BASIS OF MANY Bureau Urges the Spiking of Misstatements With Facts and General Counter-Attack

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Nov. 30 -- Rumors in wartime fall into five separate classes, the Office of War Information said today after the dissection of 4,500 specific rumors coming to the attention of various government agencies during the last eleven months.
abstract: OWI defines rumor categories, warns pub on carriers
snippet: WASHINGTON, Nov. 30 -- Rumors in wartime fall into five separate classes, the Office of War Information said today after the dissection of 4,500 specific rumors coming to the attention of various government agencies during the last eleven months....

byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES
